attributes.action: Stop the banning of Roddy Rich
attributes.additional_details: The venue is more to blame than anything the 02 academy in Brixton is where the event took place. The security team that was hired should take full responsibility for there action.
attributes.background:
They are planning on Banning roddy rich from coming back to the UK 
Because of an incident that happened at his concert that was beyond his control  
Weapons were brought into the venue but really and truely the security should be held responsible as they did not check those entering the venue

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You also need to give your full name or initial and surname to start a petition.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to allow Roddy Rich into the UK if that's something you would like to see happen.
